Configuring z/VM 179 HCPRPW004I Password changed z/VM Version 7 Release 2.0, Service Level 2001 (64-bit), built on IBM Virtualization Technology There is no logmsg data FILES: NO RDR, NO PRT, NO PUN LOGON AT 10:10:58 EDT TUESDAY 06/11/13 z/VM V7.2.0 2020-06-04 12:50 You can issue a QUERY USERID command to see that you are logged on as SYSADMIN with its privileges. 6.7.9 Using the RACF SMF data unload utility The RACF SMF data unload utility is a simple way to extract RACF type 80 SMF data. The following example shows the TYPE 80 SMF record where USERID1 was created and given access to log on by
